${ModID}:Topple.NAME: Topple
${ModID}:Topple.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 more damage for each ${ModID}:Mundane card played this combat.

${ModID}:Vanguard.NAME: Vanguard
${ModID}:Vanguard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you play a ${ModID}:Precious card with this in hand, play this.

${ModID}:Shakedown.NAME: Shakedown
${ModID}:Shakedown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card each if you hold a ${ModID}:Mundane or uncommon card.
${ModID}:Shakedown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card each if you hold a ${ModID}:Mundane, uncommon or rare card.

${ModID}:Favor.NAME: Favor
${ModID}:Favor.DESCRIPTION: Gain ${ModID}:Echo of a random rare card. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Favor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain ${ModID}:Echo of a random rare card. It costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:EtTu.NAME: Et Tu?
${ModID}:EtTu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Shivs. They have Retain. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EtTu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Shivs and 1 rare Shiv. They have Retain. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Spotlight.NAME: Spotlight
${ModID}:Spotlight.DESCRIPTION: Add a ${ModID}:Mundane card from your draw pile to your hand and ${ModID}:Promote it.
${ModID}:Spotlight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a ${ModID}:Mundane or uncommon card from your draw pile to your hand and ${ModID}:Promote it.

${ModID}:Exultation.NAME: Exultation
${ModID}:Exultation.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Promote all other cards in hand. Gain !M! Block for each card ${ModID}:Promoted.

${ModID}:Radiance.NAME: Radiance
${ModID}:Radiance.DESCRIPTION: If this card is rare, deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Demote this.

${ModID}:Apex.NAME: Apex
${ModID}:Apex.DESCRIPTION: If all cards in hand are ${ModID}:Precious, ${ModID}:Ascend. ${ModID}:Demote all cards in hand to common.

${ModID}:PowerStruggle.NAME: Power Struggle
${ModID}:PowerStruggle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a rare card, gain [E] and ${ModID}:Demote it.
